title: pvmfit
description: Fits diffusion models to multishell DWI data

number_of_fibres.title: Number of fibres
number_of_fibres.description: Number of fibres to fit - default=1

model_type.title: Model type
model_type.description: Model type: 1 for Ball-Sticks (single-shell), 2 for Ball-Sticks (multi-shells), 4 for Ball-Binghams

fit_all_models.title: Fit all models using BIC
fit_all_models.description: Fit all models from 1 up to N fibres and choose the best using BIC

constrained_nonlinear.title: Constrained nonlinear optimization
constrained_nonlinear.description: Model1: Apply constrained nonlinear optimization on the diffusivity, volume fractions and their sum

constrained_nonlinear_f.title: Constrained nonlinear optimization with fanning
constrained_nonlinear_f.description: Model1: Apply constrained nonlinear optimization on the diffusivity, volume fractions and their sum. Return n fanning angle estimates, using the Hessian of the cost function

grid_search.title: Grid search
grid_search.description: Use grid search (on the fanning eigenvalues). Default=off

include_noise_floor.title: Include noise floor
include_noise_floor.description: Include noise floor parameter in the model
